author: Kevin Glenton
title: York: River Ouse has five flood warnings and rain expected | York Press
text: FLOOD warnings have been issued for York with river levels more than double their normal levels and more rain forecast. Five flood warnings from The Environment Agency ‚Äì meaning ‚Äòact now, flooding expected‚Äô ‚Äì were in place on the River Ouse before 8am this morning (Friday, December 29) due to Storm Gerrit. The agency also has issued two flood alerts ‚Äì meaning flooding is possible ‚Äì on the River Ouse. Areas with Flood Warnings The five warnings are for the following parts of the River Ouse and areas influenced by rising river levels: - River Ouse at Acaster Malbis ‚Äì properties along Intake Lane, Mill Lane, Yew Tree Close, Darling Lane and Hauling Lane - River Ouse at Naburn Lock ‚Äì Naburn Lock Buildings and Lock Cottages - River Ouse at York ‚Äì properties on King‚Äôs Staith in York and riverside areas through York from Lendal Bridge to Millennium Bridge - River Ouse at York ‚Äì Skeldergate and Tower Street ‚Äì properties at lower levels on Skeldergate and on Tower Street near Tower Gardens, properties on Cumberland Street - River Ouse at York ‚Äì St George‚Äôs Field and Queen‚Äôs Staith ‚Äì properties along Queen‚Äôs Staith, on South Esplanade, Friars Terrace and Tower Place, St George‚Äôs Field carpark and Rowntree Park On the River Ouse in York, the Viking Recorder at 9.30am registered a level of 4.06 metres, more than double the top of the normal range of 1.90 metres. The Environment Agency has [updated its prediction for the peak of the Ouse level](https://www.yorkpress.co.uk/news/24015662.flood-warnings-york-alerts-north-yorkshire/) there, to 4.31 metres, on December 30 at 4am. It added that the Foss Barrier in York is in operation. A level there was recorded at 8.92 metres at 9.45am this morning, which is over a metre above the normal range. Today's Met Office weather forecast for York includes 'light showers in the afternoon'. It added that in Yorkshire and the Humber rain showers are expected overnight and will ease before Saturday. On Saturday, the Met Office forecast for York includes 'heavy rain by late morning', with conditions expected to brighten with sunny intervals by late morning on Sunday. City of York Council has said that Rowntree Park, St George‚Äôs Field Car Park, Esplanade Car Park are closed due to the high river levels. It also said flood defences are installed on Peckitt Street and Tower Gardens in York. It added that temporary footbridges are in place at Fordlands Road and City Mills. The Environment Agency flood alert said: ‚ÄúWe are monitoring rainfall and river levels, and are checking rivers for blockages in the area. ‚ÄúOur incident rooms are open and we are closely monitoring the situation. ‚ÄúWe are liaising with emergency services and local authorities. ‚ÄúConsider activating any property flood protection products. ‚ÄúAvoid using low-lying footpaths and any bridges near local watercourses, and do not attempt to walk, cycle or drive through water.‚Äù Comments: Our rules We want our comments to be a lively and valuable part of our community - a place where readers can debate and engage with the most important local issues. The ability to comment on our stories is a privilege, not a right, however, and that privilege may be withdrawn if it is abused or misused. Please report any comments that break our rules. [Read the rules here](/misc/comments)

author: @infobae
title: Cuba prev√© una temporada de ciclones "activa", hasta con el paso de un hurac√°n por la isla - Infobae
text:
La Habana, 7 may (EFE).- El Instituto de Meteorolog√≠a (Insmet) de Cuba prev√© una actividad cicl√≥nica "activa" en 2025 con un 50% de probabilidad de que la isla sea afectada por un hurac√°n, pero ve un peligro mayor -del 70%- en el posible azote de una tormenta tropical, reportaron este mi√©rcoles medios estatales.
El pron√≥stico para la pr√≥xima temporada de ciclones en el oc√©ano Atl√°ntico -vigente entre el 1 de junio y el 30 de noviembre- advierte sobre la formaci√≥n de quince ciclones tropicales, ocho de los cuales podr√°n alcanzar la categor√≠a de hurac√°n.
El informe detalla que del total de ciclones, diez se desarrollar√°n en el Atl√°ntico, tres en el mar Caribe y dos en el golfo de M√©xico.
Adem√°s considera que las probabilidades de que al menos un hurac√°n se origine e intensifique en el Caribe es "alta" (75%) y de que uno de procedencia atl√°ntica penetre en el Caribe es "moderada" (50%).
El Centro de Pron√≥sticos del Insmet se√±ala que la temperatura superficial del mar en la franja tropical del Atl√°ntico Norte y el mar Caribe contin√∫a registrando valores elevados, pero no tanto como los de la temporada cicl√≥nica del 2024.
Asimismo cita como otro factor de importancia el actual evento La Ni√±a Oscilaci√≥n del Sur (AENOS), de car√°cter d√©bil, que dar√° paso a condiciones neutrales en el oc√©ano Pac√≠fico y se prev√© que dichas condiciones se mantengan por el resto del a√±o.
En la temporada cicl√≥nica de 2024 se registraron siete tormentas tropicales y once huracanes, de los cuales cinco alcanzaron la categor√≠a de 3 o superior, de un m√°ximo de cinco en la escala Saffir-Simpson que mide su intensidad. Dos de esos eventos meteorol√≥gicos impactaron fuertemente a Cuba.
El 20 de octubre, √ìscar toc√≥ tierra cubana como un hurac√°n categor√≠a 1 en la provincia de Guant√°namo (extremo este) con vientos de hasta 130 km/h. Despu√©s se degrad√≥ a tormenta tropical y dej√≥ ocho fallecidos, da√±os a 12.000 viviendas, inundaciones que aislaron comunidades, p√©rdidas en la agricultura y otros estragos.
Unas dos semanas despu√©s, el hurac√°n Rafael, de categor√≠a 3, golpe√≥ el occidente cubano, mayormente a la provincia Artemisa -con vientos sostenidos de 185 km/h -aunque tambi√©n afect√≥ a las vecinas La Habana y Mayabeque- y provoc√≥ el colapso total del sistema el√©ctrico nacional, lo que afect√≥ a 10 millones de personas. EFE

author: PRNewswire
title: Argent BioPharma Enters Germany - Europe's Largest Market
text:
Strategic Expansion Paired with Over $1M in Annual Cost Savings from Operational Restructuring
PERTH, Australia , April 23, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Argent BioPharma Ltd. (ASX: RGT) (OTCQB: RGTLF), a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company specializing in neuroimmune therapies, is pleased to announce its official entry into the German pharmaceutical market with the receipt of initial purchase orders for CannEpil¬Æ and CogniCann¬Æ, following recent regulatory approval. Germany , as the largest healthcare market in Europe , represents a significant commercial milestone and a strategic beachhead for Argent's broader European expansion.
In parallel, the Company has successfully completed the transfer of its EU GMP-certified manufacturing facilities in Slovenia and Malta to trusted third-party operators. This strategic operational shift allows Argent to maintain GMP compliance while reducing infrastructure overhead, resulting in annual operational cost savings exceeding USD $1 million . These efficiencies free up capital to further accelerate R&D initiatives and clinical trials across core therapeutic programs.
These achievements reflect Argent BioPharma's broader transformation strategy‚Äîcentered on fully proprietary, neuroimmune drug development, in-house innovation, and sustainable global scalability. The Company remains focused on advancing its therapeutic pipeline while deepening market penetration across high-value regions.
About Argent BioPharma
Argent BioPharma Ltd. (ASX: RGT) develops proprietary therapeutics targeting central nervous system (CNS) and autoimmune disorders using its Neuro-Immune Modulatory (NIM) platform. Lead assets include CannEpil¬Æ, CogniCann¬Æ, and CimetrA¬Æ, which are now entering major European markets as part of a targeted international growth plan.

En France, on observait avant 1989 ¬´ en moyenne une vague de chaleur tous les cinq ans ¬ª , alors que ¬´ depuis 2000 elles se produisent √† une fr√©quence annuelle ¬ª . Ces vagues de chaleur, pr√©vient le sp√©cialiste, ¬´ seront deux fois plus nombreuses d‚Äôici trente ans ¬ª .

author: ComicBook
title: Listen to The Ballad of the Witches' Road Song from Agatha All Along
text: [Warning: This article contains mild spoilers for Agatha All Along episodes 1 and 2.] Seekest thou the road to all that‚Äôs foul and fair? Gather, listeners, and hear ‚ÄúThe Ballad of the Witches‚Äô Road (Sacred Chant Version)‚Äù from Agatha All Along. In ‚ÄúCircle Sewn with Fate Unlock Thy Hidden Gate,‚Äù the second part of Wednesday‚Äôs two-episode premiere, the witch Agatha Harkness (Kathryn Hahn) needs a coven to [access the Witches‚Äô Road](https://comicbook.com/comics/news/marvel-agatha-all-along-witches-road-explained-agatha-harkness-scarlet-witch/) and reclaim the powers stolen from her by [Wanda Maximoff‚Äôs Scarlet Witch](https://comicbook.com/tv-shows/news/agatha-all-along-scarlet-witch-mcu-return-tease-episode-1-marvel/). After Teen (Joe Locke) frees her from the spell that trapped her in [a true crime version](https://comicbook.com/tv-shows/news/agatha-all-along-episode-1-mare-of-easttown-references-explained-kathryn-hahn/) of Westview, New Jersey, Agatha gathers witchy-enough women at her Covenstead to sing the Ballad and conjure up a door to the Road. Agatha, along with her [down-and-out witches](https://comicbook.com/marvel/news/agatha-all-along-who-is-jennifer-kale/) ‚Äî potions witch Jennifer Kale (Sasheer Zamata), protection witch Alice Wu-Gulliver (Ali Ahn), and divination witch Lilia Calderu (Patti LuPone) ‚Äî sing a bewitching version of ‚ÄúThe Ballad of the Witches‚Äô Road,‚Äù which you can listen to on [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/album/18NuXd2GdffzNAVM2xIeVG), [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/us/album/Title/1768846128?ls=1&app=music&at=1010lKkZ), [Amazon Music](http://music.amazon.com/albums/B0DH6L98WX) and other digital platforms. Videos by ComicBook.com The original song is written by Oscar-winning songwriters Kristen Anderson-Lopez and Robert Lopez (‚ÄúLet It Go‚Äù from Disney‚Äôs Frozen and ‚ÄúRemember Me‚Äù from Pixar‚Äôs Coco), the composers of the viral, Grammy-nominated and Emmy-winning ‚ÄúAgatha All Along‚Äù song from WandaVision. ‚ÄúThe Ballad of the Witches‚Äô Road‚Äù is an ‚Äúancient, powerful, witchy hymn,‚Äù the duo told [Marvel.com](https://www.marvel.com/articles/tv-shows/listen-to-agatha-all-along-music-the-ballad-of-the-witches-road) of the song that premiered at D23 in August. ‚ÄúIt was even more fun to record with the inimitable Kathryn Hahn, PattiLu-freaking-Pone and the rest of this incredible coven. We challenged them with some pretty complex vocalwriting, and everyone rose to the occasion and slayed.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe Ballad of the Witches‚Äô Road (Sacred Chant Version),‚Äù ‚ÄúThe Ballad of the Witches‚Äô Road (True Crime Version),‚Äù and ‚ÄúAgatha‚Äôs Theme‚Äù are all included on Music From Agatha All Along, the official soundtrack album featuring music written and composed by Christophe Beck (Frozen, Hawkeye, and WandaVision) and Michael Paraskevas (Unspoken and Hawkeye). A 1-LP Music From Agatha All Along vinyl album goes on sale Nov. 1st and is available for pre-order at [Disney Music Emporium](https://www.disneymusicemporium.com/product/XVLP292).

title: Cristiano Ronaldo: ¬´Portugal ganhar um Europeu equivale a um Mundial¬ª :: zerozero.pt
text: Portugal venceu a Cro√°cia por 2-1 na jornada inaugural da Liga das Na√ß√µes. Cristiano Ronaldo marcou o segundo golo da forma√ß√£o das quinas e n√£o escondeu a emo√ß√£o. Cristiano Ronaldo em discurso direto: Golo 900: ¬´Foi um golo emocionante para mim. √â um n√∫mero redondo, poder√° ser um n√∫mero f√°cil, mas n√£o √©. Muito trabalho di√°rio, muita consist√™ncia, muita prepara√ß√£o. j√° tenho 39 anos e meio, por isso h√° que ser muito focado para que as coisas possam correr bem e estar neste n√≠vel. √â preciso muita dedica√ß√£o, por isso quando estes recordes v√£o acontecendo eu fico emocionado porque sei e dou valor √†quilo que fa√ßo... eu e os meus companheiros obviamente¬ª Companheiros: ¬´Sem eles era impens√°vel, por isso agradecer-lhes e dar os parab√©ns √† equipa. O mais importante foi dar uma resposta diferente daquilo que tinha acontecido no europeu. jog√°mos bem, a Cro√°cia √© um excelente equipa , bateu-se bastante bem e foi um espet√°culo de jogo¬ª Mudan√ßas: ¬´Eu senti-me mais livre do que o normal. O mister deu-me essa oportunidade. Jog√°mos de forma diferente do europeu, fizemos muitas varia√ß√µes, os jogadores andaram mais livres dentro de campo. Eu beneficio com isso, gosto de ser um jogador livre. A equipa teve bastante mobilidade, n√£o foi √† toa que o Dalot apareceu a fazer golo¬ª. Objetivos: ¬´Portugal ganhar um Europeu equivale a um Mundial. J√° ganhei dois trof√©us por Portugal que queria muito. N√£o me motivo por isso. Motivo-me por desfrutar do futebol e os recordes aparecem de um forma natural. eu n√£o bato recordes, eles √© que me perseguem. Nunca vou ser youtuber. Vou estar ali de vez em quando¬ª.
